name: Breaking Zed
description:
In this game, you are a Heisenberg-ish drug lord who is caught in the zombie apocalypse. It is a twin-stick shooter. It is also pretty buggy, although we tried to fix as much as we were able.

Done for Scream Jam 2019

Created by Kealmcking and Sakiskid

Please leave any feedback on how you think the game could be improved. Whether that be the controls, general content, etc. Thanks!
